endpoints.description: Retrieve the top trending products based on recent consumer engagement.
Access aggregated analytics of consumer preferences and purchasing behavior.
Submit current inventory data to receive optimized restocking suggestions.
Acquire sales forecasts based on current market trends and historical data.
Analyze performance metrics across different product categories.
Submit planned marketing activities and receive feedback for improvement based on trends.
Identify consumer trends segmented by geographic regions.
Remove specified alerts or notifications from users' dashboards.
Retrieve insights about competitors' activities and relative market positioning.
Access analytics on loyalty program efficacy and customer retention rates.
